front.extra:
for Respondent No. 1, 2, 3
--------------------------------------------------------------
CORAM : MR.JUSTICE D.C.SRIVASTAVA
Date of decision:

1. This is an Appeal against the Award dated
9.3.1982 of the Commissioner of Workmen's Compensation,
Jamnagar, dismissing the application of the applicants,
who were dependents of the deceased Laxmidas alias
Babubhai Makanji claiming compensation under the
provisions of the Workmen's Compensation Act, 1925.
2.The deceased was the husband of the applicant
